lead_paragraph: As befits a man who sang about tigers, demons, wizards, evil and hell, the heavy-metal vocalist Ronnie James Dio, below, was treated to a raucous memorial service on Sunday.
snippet: As befits a man who sang about tigers, demons, wizards, evil and hell, the heavy-metal vocalist Ronnie James Dio, below, was treated to a raucous memorial service on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Arts, Briefly: Fans Say Farewell to Dio
